:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:FORWARD DROP [7:2756]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
-A FORWARD -s 10.10.0.0/16 -d 10.12.0.30/32 -j ACCEPT
-A FORWARD -s 10.10.0.10/32 -d 10.13.0.40/32 -j ACCEPT

*nat
:PREROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:POSTROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
:DOCKER_OUTPUT - [0:0]
:DOCKER_POSTROUTING - [0:0]
-A OUTPUT -d 127.0.0.11/32 -j DOCKER_OUTPUT
-A POSTROUTING -d 127.0.0.11/32 -j DOCKER_POSTROUTING
-A DOCKER_OUTPUT -d 127.0.0.11/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 53 -j DNAT --to-destination 127.0.0.11:44841
-A DOCKER_OUTPUT -d 127.0.0.11/32 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -j DNAT --to-destination 127.0.0.11:44951
-A DOCKER_POSTROUTING -s 127.0.0.11/32 -p tcp -m tcp --sport 44841 -j SNAT --to-source :53
-A DOCKER_POSTROUTING -s 127.0.0.11/32 -p udp -m udp --sport 44951 -j SNAT --to-source :53
COMMIT
